frontName: Attractive Websites with Advanced Modern Features
frontText: Do you want a well-formed webpage for the project that is so far just in your mind? Are you looking for fresh decisions about the UI and UX on the existing website? Perhaps here you will find the services that can satisfy your needs. We implement cutting-edge technologies to make sure your 'virtual atmosphere' is stylish and at the same time comfortable for your potential customers.
backText: Disregarding the amount of data you are planning to keep in your server, we can make it remain consistent and organized at all stages of it functioning. Simplicity and symmetry of the API are our main goals to make it pleasant to work with. We can also offer our services in case you want to have a server-side rendering website.
fullText: Do you have big plans about your project? Are you starting from the scratch? In fact, we can design a nice website for you and work out the back-end for it to eventually make your project fully functioning. Please, have a look at the Projects presented in this portfolio and make the right decision for your great plans to turn real.
linkMeText: Perhaps you would like to know who I am in some details. Here I briefly tell about myself.
linkQualsText: I am new in the world if IT development. As a potential customer, you might want to know what academic background I have so far.
linkProjectsText: Here you might see what projects I have participated in, read project details, and visit the project page.
linkExpText: Feel free to look at my prefossional experience in the world of IT. So far, it is the least loaded page of my portfolio.

frontName: Привлекательные Веб-сайты с Передовыми Современными Функциями
frontText: Фронт, но неопровержимые выводы, а также тщательные исследования конкурентов призывают нас к новым свершениям, которые, в свою очередь, должны быть заблокированы в рамках своих собственных рациональных ограничений. А ещё предприниматели в сети интернет являются только методом политического участия и функционально разнесены на независимые элементы. Для современного мира постоянный количественный рост и сфера нашей активности создаёт необходимость включения в производственный план целого ряда внеочередных мероприятий с учётом комплекса глубокомысленных рассуждений.
